quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
author: Sam Walton

quote: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: If you owe the bank $100 that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem.

quote: It is not from the benevolence of the butcher, the brewer, or the baker that we expect our dinner, but from their regard to their own interest.

quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.

quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.
author: Dee Hock

quote: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later.

quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: If you're trying to create a company, it's like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.

quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.

quote: Details create the big picture.

quote: Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.
author: Paul Tournier

quote: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.

quote: Corporation: An ingenious device for obtaining profit without individual responsibility.

quote: When in doubt, mumble; when in trouble, delegate; when in charge, ponder.
author: James H. Boren

quote: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.

quote: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today.

quote: The work of the individual still remains the spark that moves mankind ahead even more than teamwork.
author: Igor Sikorsky

quote: Great companies are built on great products.

quote: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Ask five economists and you'll get five different answers - six if one went to Harvard.
author: Edgar Fiedler

quote: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business.

quote: The common question that gets asked in business is, 'why?' That's a good question, but an equally valid question is, 'why not?'

quote: Almost all quality improvement comes via simplification of design, manufacturing... layout, processes, and procedures.

quote: If you don't understand the details of your business you are going to fail.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: All lasting business is built on friendship.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: First-rate people hire first-rate people; second-rate people hire third-rate people.

quote: Intellectual property has the shelf life of a banana.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I believe you have to be willing to be misunderstood if you're going to innovate.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Brand is just a perception, and perception will match reality over time. Sometimes it will be ahead, other times it will be behind. But brand is simply a collective impression some have about a product.

quote: The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: To command is to serve, nothing more and nothing less.
author: Andre Malraux

quote: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: We're all working together; that's the secret.
author: Sam Walton

quote: People who don't take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year. People who do take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: The great leaders are like the best conductors - they reach beyond the notes to reach the magic in the players.
author: Blaine Lee

quote: I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill.
author: Edward Appleton

quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: The final test of a leader is that he leaves behind him in other men the conviction and the will to carry on.

quote: Do more than is required. What is the distance between someone who achieves their goals consistently and those who spend their lives and careers merely following? The extra mile.

quote: The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them.
author: Benjamin Jowett

quote: Business is a combination of war and sport.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: When Henry Ford made cheap, reliable cars people said, 'Nah, what's wrong with a horse?' That was a huge bet he made, and it worked.

quote: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.

quote: Test fast, fail fast, adjust fast.
author: Tom Peters

quote: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I want to put a ding in the universe.

quote: Meetings are indispensable when you don't want to do anything.

quote: The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant.

quote: I don't create companies for the sake of creating companies, but to get things done.

quote: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.

quote: People will buy anything that is 'one to a customer.'

quote: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: If it doesn't sell, it isn't creative.

quote: The problem is that at a lot of big companies, process becomes a substitute for thinking. You're encouraged to behave like a little gear in a complex machine. Frankly, it allows you to keep people who aren't that smart, who aren't that creative.

quote: Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it.

quote: Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something.

quote: Everyone has an invisible sign hanging from their neck saying, 'Make me feel important.' Never forget this message when working with people.

quote: If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been.

quote: Carpe per diem - seize the check.

quote: Our favorite holding period is forever.

quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.

quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.

quote: Inside every working anarchy, there's an Old Boy Network.

quote: There are two kinds of companies, those that work to try to charge more and those that work to charge less. We will be the second.

quote: Not for nothing is their motto TGIF - 'Thank God It's Friday.' They live for the weekends, when they can go do what they really want to do.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quote: Do not trust people. They are capable of greatness.
author: Stanislaw Lem

quote: Industry is fortune's right hand, and frugality its left.
author: John Ray

quote: Profit in business comes from repeat customers, customers that boast about your project or service, and that bring friends with them.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The genius of a good leader is to leave behind him a situation which common sense, without the grace of genius, can deal with successfully.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell.
author: Confucius

quote: The herd instinct among forecasters makes sheep look like independent thinkers.
author: Edgar Fiedler

quote: Rank does not confer privilege or give power. It imposes responsibility.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Definition of Statistics: The science of producing unreliable facts from reliable figures.
author: Evan Esar

quote: If the career you have chosen has some unexpected inconvenience, console yourself by reflecting that no career is without them.
author: Jane Fonda

quote: We need to become good citizens in the global village, instead of competing. What are we competing for - to drive more cars, eat more steaks? That will destroy the world.
author: Yuan T. Lee

quote: A company is only as good as the people it keeps.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Business, more than any other occupation, is a continual dealing with the future; it is a continual calculation, an instinctive exercise in foresight.
author: Henry R. Luce

quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Nothing so conclusively proves a man's ability to lead others as what he does from day to day to lead himself.

quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: One's mind has a way of making itself up in the background, and it suddenly becomes clear what one means to do.
author: A. C. Benson

quote: So little done, so much to do.
author: Cecil Rhodes

quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Try, try, try, and keep on trying is the rule that must be followed to become an expert in anything.

quote: The gambling known as business looks with austere disfavor upon the business known as gambling.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Don't simply retire from something; have something to retire to.

quote: Anyone who has lost track of time when using a computer knows the propensity to dream, the urge to make dreams come true and the tendency to miss lunch.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: I buy when other people are selling.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: More business is lost every year through neglect than through any other cause.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Informed decision-making comes from a long tradition of guessing and then blaming others for inadequate results.
author: Scott Adams

quote: If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Go to your business, pleasure, whilst I go to my pleasure, business.
author: William Wycherley

quote: Willingness to change is a strength, even if it means plunging part of the company into total confusion for a while.

quote: People are definitely a company's greatest asset. It doesn't make any difference whether the product is cars or cosmetics. A company is only as good as the people it keeps.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Our business is infested with idiots who try to impress by using pretentious jargon.

quote: Lots of folks confuse bad management with destiny.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: We succeed in enterprises which demand the positive qualities we possess, but we excel in those which can also make use of our defects.

quote: It's not what you pay a man, but what he costs you that counts.

quote: Punctuality is one of the cardinal business virtues: always insist on it in your subordinates.
author: Don Marquis

quote: If you have to forecast, forecast often.
author: Edgar Fiedler

quote: Remind people that profit is the difference between revenue and expense. This makes you look smart.

quote: Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
author: Robert Orben

quote: Spend a lot of time talking to customers face to face. You'd be amazed how many companies don't listen to their customers.
author: Ross Perot

quote: Word of mouth is the best medium of all.
author: William Bernbach

quote: Regard it as just as desirable to build a chicken house as to build a cathedral.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The opportunity is often lost by deliberating.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: A bankruptcy judge can fix your balance sheet, but he cannot fix your company.

quote: No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: I get to play golf for a living. What more can you ask for - getting paid for doing what you love.

quote: Start with good people, lay out the rules, communicate with your employees, motivate them and reward them. If you do all those things effectively, you can't miss.

quote: The characteristic of great innovators and great companies is they see a space that others do not. They don't just listen to what people tell them; they actually invent something new, something that you didn't know you needed, but the moment you see it, you say, 'I must have it.'

quote: A cardinal principle of Total Quality escapes too many managers: you cannot continuously improve interdependent systems and processes until you progressively perfect interdependent, interpersonal relationships.

quote: The majority of men meet with failure because of their lack of persistence in creating new plans to take the place of those which fail.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader.
author: Tacitus

quote: For the merchant, even honesty is a financial speculation.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time!

quote: We don't have a monopoly. We have market share. There's a difference.

quote: Web users ultimately want to get at data quickly and easily. They don't care as much about attractive sites and pretty design.

quote: I find it rather easy to portray a businessman. Being bland, rather cruel and incompetent comes naturally to me.

quote: Some people regard private enterprise as a predatory tiger to be shot. Others look on it as a cow they can milk. Not enough people see it as a healthy horse, pulling a sturdy wagon.

quote: No person will make a great business who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit.

quote: If the head man in a company is not working 12 hours a day, doing things, taking risks, but also standing with his people in the trenches at the most difficult of times, then the company loses something.

quote: The fastest way to succeed is to look as if you're playing by somebody else's rules, while quietly playing by your own.
author: Michael Korda

quote: An advertising agency is 85 percent confusion and 15 percent commission.
author: Fred Allen

quote: What we actually learn, from any given set of circumstances, determines whether we become increasingly powerless or more powerful.

quote: Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: The business of America is business.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: A consultant is someone who saves his client almost enough to pay his fee.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: The man who will use his skill and constructive imagination to see how much he can give for a dollar, instead of how little he can give for a dollar, is bound to succeed.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I don't think it's a good idea to plan to sell a company.

quote: My son is now an 'entrepreneur.' That's what you're called when you don't have a job.
author: Ted Turner

quote: Markets change, tastes change, so the companies and the individuals who choose to compete in those markets must change.

quote: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: My father told me, never have partners.
author: Howard Hughes

quote: The most important quality in a leader is that of being acknowledged as such. All leaders whose fitness is questioned are clearly lacking in force.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: I've never felt like I was in the cookie business. I've always been in a feel good feeling business. My job is to sell joy. My job is to sell happiness. My job is to sell an experience.
author: Debbi Fields

quote: The buck stops with the guy who signs the checks.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: It's called a pen. It's like a printer, hooked straight to my brain.
author: Dale Dauten

quote: An economist's guess is liable to be as good as anybody else's.
author: Will Rogers

quote: A group or an artist shouldn't get his money until his boss gets his.
author: Bobby Darin

quote: No employer today is independent of those about him. He cannot succeed alone, no matter how great his ability or capital. Business today is more than ever a question of cooperation.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Business can be a source of progressive change.
author: Jerry Greenfield

quote: The invisible hand of the market always moves faster and better than the heavy hand of government.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: When you are in any contest, you should work as if there were - to the very last minute - a chance to lose it. This is battle, this is politics, this is anything.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: If you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: One of the challenges in networking is everybody thinks it's making cold calls to strangers. Actually, it's the people who already have strong trust relationships with you, who know you're dedicated, smart, a team player, who can help you.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: If you have one good idea, people will lend you twenty.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Cannibals prefer those who have no spines.
author: Stanislaw Lem

quote: I am certainly not one of those who need to be prodded. In fact, if anything, I am the prod.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I was told to avoid the business all together because of the rejection. People would say to me, 'Don't you want to have a normal job and a normal family?' I guess that would be good advice for some people, but I wanted to act.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Definition of a Statistician: A man who believes figures don't lie, but admits than under analysis some of them won't stand up either.
author: Evan Esar

quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: No partnership between two independent companies, no matter how well run, can match the speed, effectiveness, responsiveness and efficiency of a solely owned company.
author: Edward Whitacre, Jr.

quote: I think that there is nothing, not even crime, more opposed to poetry, to philosophy, ay, to life itself than this incessant business.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Business is in itself a power.
author: Garet Garrett

quote: If you aren't playing well, the game isn't as much fun. When that happens I tell myself just to go out and play as I did when I was a kid.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Every young man would do well to remember that all successful business stands on the foundation of morality.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Business, that's easily defined - it's other people's money.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: As a small businessperson, you have no greater leverage than the truth.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: The leader who exercises power with honor will work from the inside out, starting with himself.
author: Blaine Lee

quote: Family farms and small businesses are the backbone of our communities.
author: Tom Allen

quote: If you can build a business up big enough, it's respectable.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I don't think meals have any business being deductible. I'm for separation of calories and corporations.
author: Ralph Nader

quote: You need to be in the position where it is the cost of the fuel that actually matters and not the cost of building the rocket in the first place.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Like dogs in a wheel, birds in a cage, or squirrels in a chain, ambitious men still climb and climb, with great labor, and incessant anxiety, but never reach the top.
author: Robert Browning

quote: If you fire people, you fire customers.
author: Ferdinand Piech

quote: Only a monopolist could study a business and ruin it by giving away products.
author: Scott McNealy

quote: Exchange ideas frequently.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: What's the subject of life - to get rich? All of those fellows out there getting rich could be dancing around the real subject of life.
author: Paul A. Volcker

quote: Business is never so healthy as when, like a chicken, it must do a certain amount of scratching around for what it gets.
author: Henry Ford

quote: It takes more than capital to swing business. You've got to have the A. I. D. degree to get by - Advertising, Initiative, and Dynamics.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: I never trust an executive who tends to pass the buck. Nor would I want to deal with him as a customer or a supplier.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: In business or in life, don't follow the wagon tracks too closely.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: What we've gone through in the last several years has caused some people to question 'Can we trust Microsoft?'
author: Steve Ballmer

quote: The consumer isn't a moron; she is your wife.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: Your mission is to find a product or service that can positively impact the lives of 1 billion people because that's the game we're playing today.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: Government in the U.S. today is a senior partner in every business in the country.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Never argue with a profit.
author: Jeff Rich

quote: When did it become a problem to be a small businessman and become successful? The small businessman - like my father, or like me?
author: Glenn Beck

quote: To think that the new economy is over is like somebody in London in 1830 saying the entire industrial revolution is over because some textile manufacturers in Manchester went broke.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: If being the biggest company was a guarantee of success, we'd all be using IBM computers and driving GM cars.
author: James Surowiecki

quote: Look at growth, look at how much time people spend on the Net and look at the variety of things that they are doing. It's all really good, so I am actually encouraged by the fundamentals that underlie usage growth on the Net.
author: Meg Whitman

quote: I'm not a driven businessman, but a driven artist. I never think about money. Beautiful things make money.
author: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Every few seconds it changes - up an eighth, down an eighth - it's like playing a slot machine. I lose $20 million, I gain $20 million.
author: Ted Turner

quote: A manager doesn't hear the cheers.
author: Alvin Dark

quote: Our new attitude is how can we put you in front of our customer.
author: Terry Semel

quote: The incestuous relationship between government and big business thrives in the dark.
author: Jack Anderson

quote: There was a point in the late '90s where all the graduating M.B.A.'s wanted to start companies in Silicon Valley, and for the most part they were not actually qualified to do it.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all.
author: Michael LeBoeuf

quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: We need business to understand its social responsibility, that the main task and objective for a business is not to generate extra income and to become rich and transfer the money abroad, but to look and evaluate what a businessman has done for the country, for the people, on whose account he or she has become so rich.
author: Vladimir Putin

quote: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
author: Bill Gates

quote: In the US, there is basically one party - the business party. It has two factions, called Democrats and Republicans, which are somewhat different but carry out variations on the same policies. By and large, I am opposed to those policies. As is most of the population.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: Politics is show business for ugly people.
author: Paul Begala

quote: What other people think of you is none of your business.
author: Regina Brett

quote: Your customers are the lifeblood of your business. Their needs and wants impact every aspect of your business, from product development to content marketing to sales to customer service.
author: John Rampton

quote: My philosophy is it's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am, and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Do what's best for you, and do it to the best of your ability - go after your goals like nobody's business.
author: Michael Oher

quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
author: Al Lopez

quote: It is one of my sources of happiness never to desire a knowledge of other people's business.
author: Dolley Madison

quote: In our business, things look like a failure until they're not. It's pretty binary transitions.
author: Satya Nadella

quote: I am not yet ready to be Tsar. I know nothing of the business of ruling.
author: Nicholas II of Russia

quote: Our main business is not to see what lies dimly at a distance, but to do what lies clearly at hand.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Globalization means that business strategy and business ethics cannot be separated from each other.
author: Ofra Strauss

quote: Constantine 'Costa' Gratsos had made his fortune as a lifelong associate of shipping icon Aristotle Onassis. He took a liking to me, became my first mentor, and showed me how to swim in the deep, dangerous waters of business.
author: Dan Pena

quote: Information technology and business are becoming inextricably interwoven. I don't think anybody can talk meaningfully about one without the talking about the other.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Business is war. I go out there, I want to kill the competitors. I want to make their lives miserable. I want to steal their market share. I want them to fear me and I want everyone on my team thinking we're going to win.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: The business of business is relationships; the business of life is human connection.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
author: Oscar De La Hoya

quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.
author: Richard Branson

quote: There is no health without mental health; mental health is too important to be left to the professionals alone, and mental health is everyone's business.
author: Vikram Patel

quote: When I hear people debate the ROI of social media? It makes me remember why so many business fail. Most businesses are not playing the marathon. They're playing the sprint. They're not worried about lifetime value and retention. They're worried about short-term goals.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Don't ever let your business get ahead of the financial side of your business. Accounting, accounting, accounting. Know your numbers.
author: Tilman J. Fertitta

quote: Your mindset matters. It affects everything - from the business and investment decisions you make, to the way you raise your children, to your stress levels and overall well-being.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: The gig economy is empowerment. This new business paradigm empowers individuals to better shape their own destiny and leverage their existing assets to their benefit.
author: John McAfee

quote: No one on his deathbed ever said, I wish I had spent more time on my business.
author: Paul Tsongas

quote: Like the Internet, Bitcoin will change the way people interact and do business around the world.
author: Erik Voorhees

quote: No business can stay in business without customers. How you treat - or mistreat - them determines how long your doors stay open.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: The biggest hurdle is rejection. Any business you start, be ready for it. The difference between successful people and unsuccessful people is the successful people do all the things the unsuccessful people don't want to do. When 10 doors are slammed in your face, go to door number 11 enthusiastically, with a smile on your face.
author: John Paul DeJoria

quote: I may be president of the United States, but my private life is nobody's damned business.
author: Chester A. Arthur

quote: Hackers are breaking the systems for profit. Before, it was about intellectual curiosity and pursuit of knowledge and thrill, and now hacking is big business.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: In terms of diet, my parents had a restaurant business so I don't eat any junk food - they taught me to appreciate good food.
author: Camille Rowe

quote: You can rule ignorance; you can manipulate the illiterate; you can do whatever you want when a people are uneducated, so that goes in line with corrupt business and corrupt politics.
author: will.i.am

quote: Business reporting is not dealing with objects, it is dealing with relationships between objects.
author: Hasso Plattner

quote: Go for a business that any idiot can run - because sooner or later, any idiot probably is going to run it.
author: Peter Lynch

quote: What other people think of me is none of my business.
author: Gary Oldman

quote: In almost every profession - whether it's law or journalism, finance or medicine or academia or running a small business - people rely on confidential communications to do their jobs. We count on the space of trust that confidentiality provides. When someone breaches that trust, we are all worse off for it.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: When we talk about 'smart transportation,' it is more than moving cargo from A to B. Digitization within transport and logistics means seamless service to our customers, visibility in the supply chain, and driving a more efficient business.
author: Soren Skou

quote: War is big business. It's a lot of money going to and fro, and unfortunately a lot of angst, and a lot of fear, and a lot of doubt. And eventually a lot of wonderful people, like soldiers, like men and women that are out there trying to do the best they can, they come back being wounded on many levels.
author: Jon Anderson

quote: Sustainability has to be a way of life to be a way of business.
author: Anand Mahindra

quote: Business has only two functions - marketing and innovation.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: I think a simple rule of business is, if you do the things that are easier first, then you can actually make a lot of progress.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Debt is a trap, especially student debt, which is enormous, far larger than credit card debt. It's a trap for the rest of your life because the laws are designed so that you can't get out of it. If a business, say, gets in too much debt, it can declare bankruptcy, but individuals can almost never be relieved of student debt through bankruptcy.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: The goal is not to do business with everybody who needs what you have. The goal is to do business with people who believe what you believe.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: When a team takes ownership of its problems, the problem gets solved. It is true on the battlefield, it is true in business, and it is true in life.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Intuition is the key to everything, in painting, filmmaking, business - everything. I think you could have an intellectual ability, but if you can sharpen your intuition, which they say is emotion and intellect joining together, then a knowingness occurs.
author: David Lynch

quote: It is rare to find a business partner who is selfless. If you are lucky it happens once in a lifetime.
author: Michael Eisner

quote: I believe that the rights of women and girls is the unfinished business of the 21st century.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Your own business growth and success depends on many things, and along that growing path, you are going to have to concede certain responsibilities and activities - whether for your accounting, your production, or day-to-day management.
author: Michael Gerber

quote: Punctuality is the soul of business.
author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quote: I did a business in a box called College Pro Painters. They taught you how to paint houses, how to hire and fire, how to sell, how to deal with customers. You got a one-year franchise. It was the hardest year of my life in terms of hard work. I won manager of the year. It was very successful.
author: Kimbal Musk

quote: Investing is a business where you can look very silly for a long period of time before you are proven right.
author: Bill Ackman

quote: If we listened to our intellect, we'd never have a love affair. We'd never have a friendship. We'd never go into business, because we'd be cynical. Well, that's nonsense. You've got to jump off cliffs all the time and build your wings on the way down.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: All things being equal, people will do business with a friend; all things being unequal, people will still do business with a friend.
author: Mark McCormack

quote: It is an immutable law in business that words are words, explanations are explanations, promises are promises-but only performance is reality.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: In the military, they give medals for people who are willing to sacrifice themselves so that others may survive. In business, we give bonuses to people who sacrifice others.
author: Simon Sinek

quote: Overcoming fear is the first step to success for entrepreneurs. The winners all exemplify that, and the hard work and commitment they have shown underlines what is needed to set up a business.
author: Richard Branson

quote: I couldn't sell water in a desert. I have no business acumen. I can tell you why you have no business acumen, and I can tell you why your project may or may not work, but I have no ability to make money.
author: Richard Quest

quote: Hospitality is central to the restaurant business, yet it's a hard idea to define precisely. Mostly, it involves being nice to people and making them feel welcome. You notice it when it's there, and you particularly notice it when it isn't. A single significant lapse in this area can be your dominant impression of an entire meal.
author: John Lanchester

quote: People are the core of every business. Businesses are based on relationships, and relationships are based on people. I would go to an average restaurant run by amazing people over an outstanding restaurant run by awful people.
author: Marcus Lemonis

quote: A great business at a fair price is superior to a fair business at a great price.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: All animals, except man, know that the principal business of life is to enjoy it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Civilizations are not remembered by their business people, their bankers or lawyers. They're remembered by the arts.
author: Eli Broad

quote: Having been in the restaurant business, our job in the restaurant business is to be responsible for our customers' happiness. It's the nature of the hospitality business. You need to take care of people. You take care of customers above all others. Customers are your lifeblood.
author: Andrew Zimmern

quote: You can't be successful in business without taking risks. It's really that simple.
author: Adena Friedman

quote: If people in the media cannot decide whether they are in the business of reporting news or manufacturing propaganda, it is all the more important that the public understand that difference, and choose their news sources accordingly.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: If we die, we want people to accept it. We're in a risky business, and we hope that if anything happens to us, it will not delay the program. The conquest of space is worth the risk of life.
author: Gus Grissom

quote: There is no time and space in the digital world. People chat and collaborate through social networks. Cultural icons garner millions of fans online in locations they have often never been themselves. The boundary between public and private life is now everyone's business.
author: Eduardo Paes

quote: When a management with a reputation for brilliance tackles a business with a reputation for bad economics, it is the reputation of the business that remains intact.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I am careful not to confuse excellence with perfection. Excellence I can reach for; perfection is God's business.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: I heard someone from the music business saying they are no longer looking for talent, they want people with a certain look and a willingness to cooperate.
author: Joni Mitchell

quote: If anything is good for pounding humility into you permanently, it's the restaurant business.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: I must create a system or be enslaved by another mans; I will not reason and compare: my business is to create.
author: William Blake

quote: People want to start their own business or become financially independent. But you don't end up a successful entrepreneur unless you find a way to love the risk, the uncertainty, the repeated failures, and working insane hours on something you have no idea whether will be successful or not.
author: Mark Manson

quote: When you see corruption, when you see injustice, you speak up. You don't just shut up and say it's none of my business.
author: Manal al-Sharif

quote: If you deprive yourself of outsourcing and your competitors do not, you're putting yourself out of business.
author: Lee Kuan Yew

quote: In the luxury business, you have to build on heritage.
author: Bernard Arnault

quote: I am a graduate in business management with specialisation in finance, and I love accounts!
author: Tena Desae

quote: It's important to think good, speak good, and do good. If we want to see positive change in the world, then we need to connect to goodness. I try in everything I do, both in business and philanthropy, to make a positive change and do that by doing good.
author: Shari Arison

quote: I believe fundamental honesty is the keystone of business.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Married couples who work together to build and maintain a business assume broad responsibilities. Not only is their work important to our local and national economies, but their success is central to the well-being of their families.
author: Melissa Bean

quote: There's no reason to be the richest man in the cemetery. You can't do any business from there.
author: Colonel Sanders

quote: Networking has been cited as the number one unwritten rule of success in business. Who you know really impacts what you know.
author: Sallie Krawcheck

quote: My father runs a restaurant business in Delhi, so if I had chosen to sell kebabs, it would be far easier for me than for anybody else.
author: Huma Qureshi

quote: I wouldn't say I was the best manager in the business. But I was in the top one.
author: Brian Clough

quote: The TV business is uglier than most things. It is normally perceived as some kind of cruel and shallow money trench through the heart of the journalism industry, a long plastic hallway where thieves and pimps run free and good men die like dogs, for no good reason.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: There is no greater feeling in business than building a product which impacts people's lives in a profound way. When we look around at the thousands of people who have attended Summit gatherings, it makes us smile to see the new friendships, business partnerships and philanthropic initiatives that each event produces.
author: Elliott Bisnow

quote: I am a social democrat - I believe in pursuing greater equality and tackling social justice - but... you can't do that unless you have got a strong economy, unless you have got a vibrant business base earning the wealth that makes that possible.
author: Nicola Sturgeon

quote: Every breakthrough business idea begins with solving a common problem. The bigger the problem, the bigger the opportunity. I discovered a big one when I took apart an IBM PC. I made two interesting discoveries: The components were all manufactured by other companies, and the system that retailed for $3,000 cost about $600 in parts.
author: Michael Dell

quote: Time flies so quick. I remember my second year in business when Bullocks Wilshire did a whole window of my white dresses. I was so excited, I went there at night and took pictures.
author: Tadashi Shoji

quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: Sweat equity is the most valuable equity there is. Know your business and industry better than anyone else in the world. Love what you do or don't do it.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: The main business of a lawyer is to take the romance, the mystery, the irony, the ambiguity out of everything he touches.
author: Antonin Scalia

quote: Jim Newman, the business visionary who created the term 'comfort zone,' showed me how to expand my horizons. Thanks to Jim, after I attended one of his PACE Seminars in 1978; I moved out of my comfort zone at Bear Stearns and became a super successful oilman.
author: Dan Pena

quote: Behind every small business, there's a story worth knowing. All the corner shops in our towns and cities, the restaurants, cleaners, gyms, hair salons, hardware stores - these didn't come out of nowhere.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: When you run a part of the relay and pass on the baton, there is no sense of unfinished business in your mind. There is just the sense of having done your part to the best of your ability. That is it. The hope is to pass on the baton to somebody who will run faster and run a better marathon.
author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Know your target audience. Always keep them at the forefront of your mind. Understand their lifestyle and what they are looking for. Gather their feedback and use it to tailor your approach. The voice of the consumer is an essential input into the development of any fashion business or blog.
author: Imran Amed

quote: No one has a greater asset for his business than a man's pride in his work.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: Information technology is at the core of how you do your business and how your business model itself evolves.
author: Satya Nadella

quote: The monarchy is foremost a business, and it's important to them that the British public continue to finance the excessive luxurious lifestyles of the now quite enormous, wasteful and useless 'royal' family. I find it very sad.
author: Morrissey

quote: The concept of corporate social responsibility (CSR) has long been used as an effective lens through which to examine the actions business can take toward ensuring mutual long-term well-being and sustainability.
author: Klaus Schwab

quote: I've heard people say South Africans are arrogant, that they act no differently from their colonial masters. That needs to change. It's in your business interest as an entrepreneur to form meaningful partnerships. That's how you do well for your shareholders.
author: Patrice Motsepe

quote: We hire military veterans because they make great employees. They bring proven technical and leadership skills. They understand teamwork, and they're adaptable. Bottom line, hiring veterans is good for business.
author: Randall L. Stephenson

quote: Longevity in this business is about being able to reinvent yourself or invent the future.
author: Satya Nadella

quote: Most people are not good people. In business, in art, in almost every 'world' I've been in, most people I've meet are pretty gray to black. It takes practice to be the person who is a source of compassion and honesty.
author: James Altucher

quote: No dancer can watch Fred Astaire and not know that we all should have been in another business.
author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quote: I think everybody has their own way of looking at their lives as some kind of pilgrimage. Some people will see their role as a pilgrim in terms of setting up a fine family, or establishing a business inheritance. Everyone's got their own definition.
author: Eric Clapton

quote: Almost everything worthwhile carries with it some sort of risk, whether it's starting a new business, whether it's leaving home, whether it's getting married, or whether it's flying in space.
author: Chris Hadfield

quote: Raising the minimum wage represents a substantial financial burden for employers, particularly start-ups, early stage companies, and family-owned businesses. In response, business owners would be forced to either lay off workers or raise prices to offset the rise in labor costs.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

quote: If you wait for the right time or the good times to start a business, you wait all your life.
author: Fran Tarkenton

quote: Before WeWork, I had a baby clothing company. When I started out, I had no real contacts in the garment business and no mentor to guide me on how things worked. I just had an idea to put pads on the baby clothes on to protect the baby's knees.
author: Adam Neumann

quote: Our business is about technology, yes. But it's also about operations and customer relationships.
author: Michael Dell

quote: I've got to keep breathing. It'll be my worst business mistake if I don't.
author: Steve Martin

quote: I have always said that everyone is in sales. Maybe you don't hold the title of salesperson, but if the business you are in requires you to deal with people, you, my friend, are in sales.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: For capitalism, war and peace are business and nothing but business.
author: Karl Liebknecht

quote: We all have a life story and a message that can inspire others to live a better life or run a better business. Why not use that story and message to serve others and grow a real business doing it?
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: If you're not learning, then you're stagnant. If you're stagnant, then you're not evolving and the business isn't progressing.
author: Seth Rollins

quote: I had accepted a position as a business analyst at Deloitte Consulting in New York. But before I went into that workforce, I decided to take a year off and went to India to do a social enterprise fellowship. It wasn't the best fit, but that was where a TV show in Korea found me and invited me to first come perform.
author: Eric Nam

quote: Your political views should be your political views. I believe in business being non-partisan.
author: Mark Henry

quote: Today, companies have to radically revolutionize themselves every few years just to stay relevant. That's because technology and the Internet have transformed the business landscape forever. The fast-paced digital age has accelerated the need for companies to become agile.
author: Nolan Bushnell

quote: The most important characteristics you need to succeed in business are resilience, determination and persistence.
author: Karren Brady

quote: I am into the candle business, have a home store, The White Window, and interior designing is my primary occupation, though writing now seems to have become better known.
author: Twinkle Khanna

quote: Patience is the most necessary quality for business, many a man would rather you heard his story than grant his request.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: In the modern world of business, it is useless to be a creative, original thinker unless you can also sell what you create.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: There is a simple rule here, a rule of legislation, a rule of business, a rule of life: beyond a certain point, complexity is fraud. You can apply that rule to left-wing social programs, but you can also apply that rule to credit derivatives, hedge funds, all the rest of it.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Roosevelt's New Deal regulated business, protected social welfare and promoted national infrastructure on the principle that the role of government was not simply to protect the property of the wealthy, but rather was to promote equality of opportunity for all.
author: Heather Cox Richardson

quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Organized religion is a sham and a crutch for weak-minded people who need strength in numbers. It tells people to go out and stick their noses in other people's business.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Business is all about risk taking and managing uncertainties and turbulence.
author: Gautam Adani

quote: The biggest sources of opportunity are collaboration and partnership. And today, with digital communication, there is more of that everywhere. We need to expose ourselves to that as a matter of doing business.
author: Mark Parker

quote: The golden rule for every business man is this: 'Put yourself in your customer's place.'
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Emotions have no place in business, unless you do business with them.
author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: In this business, by the time you realize you're in trouble, it's too late to save yourself. Unless you're running scared all the time, you're gone.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Let us permit nature to have her way. She understands her business better than we do.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: I started with shoes, and with hard work and discipline, the business prospered.
author: Henry Sy

quote: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.
author: Dave Barry

quote: I came into this music business at 26 years old. I was a fully developed man at that point. At that age, I didn't have anything to prove.
author: Jay-Z

quote: We're in the business of selling pleasure. We don't sell handbags or haute couture. We sell dreams.
author: Alain Wertheimer

quote: The quality of your life is determined by the quality of your relationships. The quality of your business is no different.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: I am a very hands-on person, and I like to be involved in driving my business.
author: Baba Kalyani

quote: To qualify the term 'boss' by adding 'girl' or 'babe' or 'honey' or 'pink' or whatever other ridiculous, antiquated-gender role assignment the media thinks is cute this month, is, at the least, disrespectful and at the worst, damaging to the way young women view themselves and our fight for equality in the business world.
author: Rachel Hollis

quote: In this business you either sink or swim or you don't.
author: David Smith

quote: Digitization and new technologies are rapidly changing all industries, forcing them to prepare for a tomorrow that is unpredictable. This also applies to the industry of container shipping, ports, and logistics, which largely has been driven by the traditional business models focused on optimizing how you move goods.
author: Soren Skou

quote: Business is a battlefield. You need to be able to go to battle with your team members. Like the military. Know them, trust them, and know who you're working with.
author: Pamela Meyer

quote: Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
author: Jack Welch

quote: In the real estate business you learn more about people, and you learn more about community issues, you learn more about life, you learn more about the impact of government, probably than any other profession that I know of.
author: Johnny Isakson

quote: For me, the winning strategy in any start-up business is, 'Think big but start small.'
author: Carmen Busquets

quote: Being a Navy SEAL and sniper taught me all about risk management. Take away all the risk variables under your control and reduce it to an acceptable level. The same fundamentals apply in business.
author: Brandon Webb

quote: Profitability is coming from productivity, efficiency, management, austerity, and the way to manage the business.
author: Carlos Slim

quote: It doesn't matter whether you are pursuing success in business, sports, the arts, or life in general: The bridge between wishing and accomplishing is discipline.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: You are free; you are free to go to your temples, you are free to go to your mosques or to any other place or worship in this State of Pakistan. You may belong to any religion or caste or creed - that has nothing to do with the business of the State.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: There is not a week that goes by that I don't have a dream that I am back in the business.
author: Alan Gerry

quote: Succeeding in business is not just about making money.
author: Daniel Snyder

quote: A business has to be involving, it has to be fun, and it has to exercise your creative instincts.
author: Richard Branson

quote: You learn in this business: It you want a friend, get a dog.
author: Carl Icahn

quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.
author: Grenville Kleiser

quote: Perhaps the greatest utopia would be if we could all realize that no utopia is possible; no place to run, no place to hide, just take care of business here and now.
author: Jack Carroll

quote: Justice means minding one's own business and not meddling with other men's concerns.
author: Plato

quote: I have found adventure in flying, in world travel, in business, and even close at hand... Adventure is a state of mind - and spirit.
author: Jacqueline Cochran

quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things; that's all.
author: Harry Seidler

quote: A successful economic development strategy must focus on improving the skills of the area's workforce, reducing the cost of doing business and making available the resources business needs to compete and thrive in today's global economy.
author: Rod Blagojevich

quote: Before you can become a millionaire, you must learn to think like one. You must learn how to motivate yourself to counter fear with courage. Making critical decisions about your career, business, investments and other resources conjures up fear, fear that is part of the process of becoming a financial success.
author: Thomas J. Stanley

quote: The saying in business is that, 'You hire for skills and you fire for behavior.' And one would argue that in order to move up in career, to be promoted, to take on additional responsibility, in many ways that's linked more to the attitudes and behaviors that you carry rather than what you know technically about a given subject.
author: Gerald Chertavian

quote: Being a top performer - whether it's in business or on the athletic field - requires grit and tenacity, as well as the continuous desire to become better.
author: Amy Morin

quote: All the business of war, and indeed all the business of life, is to endeavour to find out what you don't know by what you do; that's what I called 'guess what was at the other side of the hill'.
author: Duke of Wellington

quote: My dad was a man of integrity who taught me to always do the right thing even when nobody is watching. He ran a trucking company, and watching how he operated his business instilled a drive and work ethic that stuck with me.
author: Rob Stone

quote: My vision is to build an e-commerce ecosystem that allows consumers and businesses to do all aspects of business online.
author: Jack Ma

quote: The more people you meet, and the more people you have influence over your business can scale quicker.
author: Peter Jones

quote: There will always be a business cycle, and white-collar workers will get hit in the next recession like they always do in recessions.
author: Robert Reich

quote: In business, the idea of measuring what you are doing, picking the measurements that count like customer satisfaction and performance... you thrive on that.
author: Bill Gates

quote: That Will Never Work' is the untold story of Netflix. It's how a handful of people, with no experience in the video business, went from mailing a used Patsy Cline CD and ended up with a publicly traded company.
author: Marc Randolph

quote: Perhaps one of the most important accomplishments of my administration has been minding my own business.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: I was at this casino minding my own business, and this guy came up to me and said, 'You're gonna have to move, you're blocking a fire exit.' As though if there was a fire, I wasn't gonna run. If you're flammible and have legs, you are never blocking a fire exit.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Every good business story has a conflict and triumph at the core and a turning point where a transformation takes place.
author: Dinesh Paliwal

quote: I have learned the hard way to mind my business, without judging who people are and what they do. I am more troubled by the lack of space being provided for the truth to unfold. Humans cannot seem to wait for or honor the truth. Instead, we make it up based on who we believe people should or should not be.
author: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: The world is full of people who have dreams of playing at Carnegie Hall, of running a marathon, and of owning their own business. The difference between the people who make it across the finish line and everyone else is one simple thing: an action plan.
author: John Tesh

quote: The best way to look at any business is from the standpoint of the clients.
author: Jamie Dimon

quote: In the end, all business operations can be reduced to three words: people, product, and profits.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: We need to revise our economic thinking to give full value to our natural resources. This revised economics will stabilize both the theory and the practice of free-market capitalism. It will provide business and public policy with a powerful new tool for economic development, profitability, and the promotion of the public good.
author: Paul Hawken

quote: If Satan wasn't around, churches would go out of business.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: On my business card, I am a corporate president. In my mind, I am a computer programmer. But in my heart, I am a gamer.
author: Satoru Iwata

quote: Our movements and feelings are constantly monitored, because surveillance is the business model of the digital age.
author: Katharine Viner

quote: Ethics or simple honesty is the building blocks upon which our whole society is based, and business is a part of our society, and it's integral to the practice of being able to conduct business, that you have a set of honest standards.
author: Kerry Stokes

quote: When sustainability is viewed as being a matter of survival for your business, I believe you can create massive change.
author: Cameron Sinclair

quote: Reality TV is flat with the anti-cultural imperatives of business: cheap to make, it does ideological work even when it is not giving guru status to dull business people. It fits in with capitalism's anti-mythic myth: the idea that we have liberated ourselves from the dangerous illusions allegedly propagated by art and politics.
author: Mark Fisher

quote: This is a fantastic time to be entering the business world, because business is going to change more in the next 10 years than it has in the last 50.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The success combination in business is: Do what you do better... and: do more of what you do.
author: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A company's logo can be a visual ambassador, one that goes on everything from business cards to delivery trucks. When used effectively, it can be the window into the soul of a brand.
author: Tahl Raz

quote: Starting a business is not for everyone. Starting a business - I'd say, number one is have a high pain threshold.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Starting a business and building a product are not for the faint of heart. You have to learn to not let little disappointments get you down and to stay focused on the big picture.
author: Gillian Tans

quote: Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: Caste is about dividing people up in ways that preclude every form of solidarity, because even in the lowest castes, there are divisions and sub-castes, and everyone's co-opted into the business of this hierarchical, silo-ised society.
author: Arundhati Roy

quote: Team synergy has an extraordinary impact on business results.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: Tact and diplomacy are fine in international relations, in politics, perhaps even in business; in science only one thing matters, and that is the facts.
author: Hans Eysenck

quote: I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: As a goalkeeper you need to be good at organising the people in front of you and motivating them. You need to see what's going on and react to the threats. Just like a good manager in business.
author: Peter Shilton

quote: I may be kindly, I am ordinarily gentle, but in my line of business I am obliged to will terribly what I will at all.
author: Catherine the Great

quote: I went to art school in Chicago for a year at Columbia College. I had this whole master plan of getting into sustainable development and green architecture and construction, so I wanted to go to business school and then get my masters in construction and development.
author: Nico Tortorella

quote: And I'm not apolitical - I'm very specific in my politics. But a lot of the time it's nobody's business unless you're over at my house having dinner.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: For my money, Tony Bennett is the best singer in the business. He excites me when I watch him. He moves me. He's the singer who gets across what the composer has in mind, and probably a little more.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: My father, Beric, ran a joinery business and owned two factories.
author: Toyah Willcox

quote: If every company becomes a technology company, business models and transitions are going to occur. From a CEO's perspective, this is going to be the biggest technology transition of all times.
author: John T. Chambers

quote: It's time to fundamentally change the way that we do business in Washington. To help build a new foundation for the 21st century, we need to reform our government so that it is more efficient, more transparent, and more creative. That will demand new thinking and a new sense of responsibility for every dollar that is spent.
author: Barack Obama

quote: The best minds are not in government. If any were, business would steal them away.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: While digital wallets are paving the way for the future of payments, you still need to assess whether or not they'll work for your business. If your target audience are less tech-savvy or you're primarily a cash-only business, it may not be worth investing too much into accepting digital payments.
author: John Rampton

quote: If there's one thing that's certain in business, it's uncertainty.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: With success comes responsibility of playing your part, to do what you can to help not only those that helped you get to where you're at, but the future of who's going to be playing a part of your business and everything you do in your entire career.
author: Rob Dyrdek

quote: I admire the courage and self-reliance it takes to start your own business and make it succeed.
author: Martha Stewart

quote: The vast majority of small business owners want nothing to do with figuring out a website. They are neck-deep in their business trying to keep it going.
author: Andrew Yang

quote: So much of life is a negotiation - so even if you're not in business, you have opportunities to practice all around you.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: Free Trade puts consumers at the centre of economic activity. It lowers the cost of imports, which gives people the opportunity to buy more with the same amount of money: domestic producers have to compete with the lowest global costs or invest in new business.
author: Jacob Rees-Mogg

quote: In many spheres of human endeavor, from science to business to education to economic policy, good decisions depend on good measurement.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: God has blessed me with a wonderful family, a successful business, and outstanding employees. I do not take these blessings lightly.
author: David Green

quote: Desperation is the perfume of the young actor. It's so satisfying to have gotten rid of it. If you keep smelling it, it can drive you crazy. In this business a lot of people go nuts, go eccentric, even end up dead from it. Not my plan.
author: Uma Thurman

quote: Company culture is my number one priority. It's more important than the team, the product, the business model, or the investors. All of those things can be fixed and made better over time. But culture has to be established on Day 1.
author: Eric Yuan

quote: Jerry Ormand was already a legendary Texas oilman when I met him. Yet he took the time to introduce me to the fine points of the oil business and how to survive and prosper amid the chaos of a rough-and-tumble industry.
author: Dan Pena

quote: When work is not going well, it's useful to remember that our identities stretch beyond what is on the business card, that we were people long before we became workers - and will continue to be human once we have put our tools down forever.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: In this business, there is an insane amount of pressure, spoken and unspoken, to be thin. If you look at some of the television shows, eating disorders become like a competitive thing.
author: Kim Raver

quote: Music is spiritual. The music business is not.
author: Van Morrison

quote: To thrive, all businesses must focus on the art of self-disruption. Rather than wait for the competition to steal your business, every founder and employee needs to be willing to cannibalize their existing revenue streams in order to create new ones. All disruption starts with introspection.
author: Jay Samit

quote: Small business is the backbone of our economy. I'm for big business, too. But small business is where the jobs are generated.
author: Michele Bachmann

quote: If we all act together - business, governments, NGOs and citizens and, especially, the young - just imagine the good we could create.
author: Paul Polman

quote: The more you drive positive change, the more enhanced your business model.
author: Anand Mahindra

quote: In business it's about people. It's about relationships.
author: Kathy Ireland

quote: It's been a rollercoaster ride. There have been some great moments and some low points... like when I was leaving Stax. That's when I actually thought of getting out of the business.
author: William Bell

quote: Barack Obama's life was so much simpler in 2009. Back then, he had refined the cold act of blaming others for the bad economy into an art form. Deficits? Blame Bush's tax cuts. Spending? Blame the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. No business investment? Blame Wall Street.
author: John Sununu

quote: Creativity is an import-export business.
author: Ethan Zuckerman

quote: We didn't know how to run a business, but we had dreams and talent.
author: Ruth Handler

quote: There is an immutable conflict at work in life and in business, a constant battle between peace and chaos. Neither can be mastered, but both can be influenced. How you go about that is the key to success.
author: Phil Knight

quote: Employers have recognized for some time that it's smart business to have a diverse workforce - one in which many views are represented and everyone's talents are valued. Well, disability is part of diversity.
author: Tom Perez

quote: Sustainability makes good business sense, and we're all on the same team at the end of the day. That's the truth about the human condition.
author: Paul Polman

quote: The One Ford plan drives the business to get PGA, Profitable Growth for All, meaning that every year we increase the profits and cash flow. So how do we do that? We serve all the markets around the world with a complete family of vehicles and use the One Ford Plan.
author: Alan Mulally

quote: Young people are fitter to invent than to judge; fitter for execution than for counsel; and more fit for new projects than for settled business.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: My father is a taxi driver, and my mother ran a small business. I hadn't even met a barrister before I got my first shot at the legal profession. But back then, I was lucky enough to be given a break - I can't help but wonder if I would be so lucky today.
author: Robert Rinder

quote: The first thing I heard when I got in the business - not from my mentor - was, 'Bulls make money, bears make money, and pigs get slaughtered.' I'm here to tell you I was a pig. And I strongly believe the only way to make long-term returns in our business that are superior is by being a pig.
author: Stanley Druckenmiller

quote: Women hold up more than half the sky and represent much of the world's unrealized potential. They are the educators. They raise the children. They hold families together and increasingly drive economies. They are natural leaders. We need their full engagement... in government, business and civil society.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: As far as this business of solitary confinement goes, the most important thing for survival is communication with someone, even if it's only a wave or a wink, a tap on the wall, or to have a guy put his thumb up. It makes all the difference.
author: John McCain

quote: From time to time, you have seminal personalities who really change the way the world sees itself - people like Gandhi, Martin Luther King, Nelson Mandela. Warren Buffett is that kind of person in the business world.
author: Guy Spier

quote: Hard work isn't enough. And more work is never the real answer. The sort of grit you need to scale a business is less reliant on brute force. It's actually one part determination, one part ingenuity, and one part laziness.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: If I had been thinking business since I was 21, I'd be a rich man right now.
author: Nate Diaz

quote: You know, I look like a woman but I think like a man. And in this world of business, that has helped me a lot. Because by the time they think that I don't know what's goin' on, I then got the money, and gone.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: I come from a family of business people, but I had the idea I wanted to become an artist.
author: Dick Bruna

quote: Our business in life is not to get ahead of others, but to get ahead of ourselves.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: The Internet has changed the way we communicate with each other, the way we learn about the world and the way we conduct business.
author: Ron Wyden

quote: No business in the world has ever made more money with poorer management.
author: Bill Terry

quote: I really love travelling to places where I get to learn something new about a new group of people or a new place. Learn some history, contemplate some business ideas, and sort of get off the beaten track a little bit.
author: Leila Janah

quote: Joy is the serious business of Heaven.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: If someone asks me what cloud computing is, I try not to get bogged down with definitions. I tell them that, simply put, cloud computing is a better way to run your business.
author: Marc Benioff

quote: In this age of communications that span both distance and time, the only tool we have that approximates a 'whisper' is encryption. When I cannot whisper in my wife's ear or the ears of my business partners, and have to communicate electronically, then encryption is our tool to keep our secrets secret.
author: John McAfee

quote: The nature of the global business environment guarantees that no matter how hard we work to create a stable and healthy organisation, our organisation will continue to experience dramatic changes far beyond our control.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: Every night, half an hour before curtain up, the bells of St. Malachy's, the Actors' Chapel on New York's 49th Street, peal the tune of 'There's No Business Like Show Business.' If you walk the streets of the theatre district before a show and see the vast, enthusiastic lines it sounds like a calling: there is certainly no place like Broadway.
author: Dan Stevens

quote: Sometimes, idealistic people are put off the whole business of networking as something tainted by flattery and the pursuit of selfish advantage. But virtue in obscurity is rewarded only in Heaven. To succeed in this world you have to be known to people.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: I don't care what straight people do, I don't care what gay people do. I don't care what nobody do. That's they business. I just care about what I do. You know what I'm saying?
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: A business like an automobile, has to be driven, in order to get results.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: Good design is good business.
author: Ian Schrager

quote: Five days a week, I read my goals before I go to sleep and when I wake up. There are 10 goals around health, family and business with expiration dates, and I update them every six months.
author: Daymond John

quote: If you were successful, somebody along the line gave you some help... Somebody helped to create this unbelievable American system that we have that allowed you to thrive. Somebody invested in roads and bridges. If you've got a business - you didn't build that. Somebody else made that happen.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I started the site when I was 19. I didn't know much about business back then.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: My mom worked for Apple, and my dad owned his own business.
author: Travis Scott

quote: You take care of business on the field; everything will take care of itself off the field.
author: JuJu Smith-Schuster

quote: The bold enterprises are the successful ones. Take counsel of hopes rather than of fears to win in this business.
author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: There is an old show business saying which warns never to work with animals or children, but nobody prepared me for Molly Meldrum.
author: Prince Charles

quote: What helps people, helps business.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: While big business gain subsidies and political access, small businesses drown in red tape, and individuals now risk being classified as terrorists for complaining about it. Economic globalisation is about homogenising differences in the worlds' markets, cultures, tastes and traditions. It's about giving big business access to a global market.
author: Zac Goldsmith

quote: I started out mopping floors, waiting tables, and tending bar at my dad's tavern. I put myself through school working odd jobs and night shifts. I poured my heart and soul into a small business. And when I saw how out-of-touch Washington had become with the core values of this great nation, I put my name forward and ran for office.
author: John Boehner

quote: In sports and in business, the greatest leaders are those who make the best decisions in the most crucial of situations. They are the ones who focus their energy on turning tough decisions into winning decisions.
author: Don Yaeger

quote: Business is not just doing deals; business is having great products, doing great engineering, and providing tremendous service to customers. Finally, business is a cobweb of human relationships.
author: Ross Perot

quote: 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink; but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: We all have a choice. We can create transformational action that will safeguard the living conditions for future generations. Or we can continue with our business as usual and fail.
author: Greta Thunburg

quote: Although it's easy to forget sometimes, a share is not a lottery ticket... it's part-ownership of a business.
author: Peter Lynch
